ch0180_00_tierno/0101_0701_01_10:
All riiight, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Looks like
your partner’s gettin’ in the groove too!
ch0180_00_tierno/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m really having fun! My feet are tapping out a
rhythm of their own!
ch0180_00_tierno/7101_0701_01_10:
Every day feels like a festival on Pasio! I like it
here!
ch0180_00_tierno/7101_0701_02_10:
And it seems like I’ll be able to make lots of
friends, too! Do you suppose anyone is interested
in dance?
ch0180_00_tierno/7101_0701_03_10:
How about you? Why don’t you dance together
with my team?
ch0180_00_tierno/7102_0701_01_10:
There are actually a lot of Pokémon that’re good
at dancing.
ch0180_00_tierno/7102_0701_02_10: Like Bellossom, Oricorio, Steenee...and lots more!
ch0180_00_tierno/7102_0701_03_10:
It’s my dream to dance together with all sorts of
Pokémon!
ch0180_00_tierno/7103_0701_01_10:
I wanna get strong enough to battle alongside my
friends here on Pasio.
ch0180_00_tierno/7103_0701_02_10:
I wasn’t able to do that back in Kalos, but I feel
like this is my chance to try again!
ch0180_00_tierno/7104_0701_01_10:
Do you ever think about which Pokémon resembles
you the most?
ch0180_00_tierno/7104_0701_02_10:
I think for me it might be Ludicolo, ’cause I also
feel like dancing when I hear lively music!
ch0180_00_tierno/7105_0701_01_10: I want to use Pokémon moves in dance routines...
ch0180_00_tierno/7105_0701_02_10:
Do you have a favorite kind of dance,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0180_00_tierno/7105_0701_03_10: I like Swords Dance... No, Teeter Dance...
ch0180_00_tierno/7105_0701_04_10: They’ve all got their charms, so I can’t decide!
ch0180_00_tierno/1701_0701_01_10: All riiight! Good timing! Here, take this!
ch0180_00_tierno/1701_0702_01_10:
If it makes you happy, that makes me happy too!
Like my heart is dancing!
ch0180_00_tierno/2501_0701_01_10:
Have you heard of Pokémon Contests? They’re
popular in Hoenn and Sinnoh!
ch0180_00_tierno/2501_0701_02_10:
From what I’ve heard about them, showcasing your
Pokémon’s charms is crucial.
ch0180_00_tierno/2501_0701_03_10:
I really wanna enter one someday! Do you think I
could win?!
ch0180_00_tierno/2501_0702_01_10: I hear there are contest stars here on Pasio!
ch0180_00_tierno/2501_0702_02_10: Wanna come with me and ask for some autographs?
ch0180_00_tierno/2511_0701_01_10:
Do you have a battle style that you wouldn’t give
up for anything?
ch0180_00_tierno/2511_0701_02_10:
The more you like it, the more you can concentrate
on it and get better and better...
ch0180_00_tierno/2511_0701_03_10:
So I think it’s great to have confidence in the
things you like!
ch0180_00_tierno/2511_0702_01_10:
Whether you win or lose, the most important thing
is to have fun!
ch0180_00_tierno/2511_0702_02_10:
That’s what makes Pokémon so special. Anything
can be fun when you’ve got your partner
with you!
ch0180_00_tierno/3001_0701_01_10:
What a beautiful morning! Wanna spend it dancing
with me?
ch0180_00_tierno/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s a nice day for a walk. The streets sure wind
and wander here.
ch0180_00_tierno/3005_0701_01_10:
Looks like it’s time for bed! I hope I can keep
dancing in my dreams.
